tit.e: Kabuki Juhachiban (18 best plays of the Ichikawa family of kabuki actors)
Kabuki Juhachiban (18 best plays of the Ichikawa family of kabuki actors)
Kabuki Juhachiban (18 best plays of the Ichikawa family of kabuki actors)

sen.j: 歌舞伎十八番（かぶき じゅうはちばん）とは、市川團十郎 (7代目)が選定した家の芸。
sen.e: Kabuki Juhachiban refers to performances selected by Danjuro ICHIKAWA (the seventh), that are specialties of his kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) school,
Kabuki Juhachiban refers to performances selected by Danjuro ICHIKAWA (the seventh), that are specialties of his kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) school.
sen.cmt: パンクチュエーションミスです。
sen.e: Kabuki Juhachiban refers to performances selected by Danjuro ICHIKAWA (the seventh), that are specialties of his kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) school.

sen.j: 天保3 (1832年) 年3月、七代目が江戸市村座で『助六』を演じた。
sen.e: In March, 1832, the Seventh performed "Sukeroku" at Edo Ichimuraza theater.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処 『助六』定訳不明
sen.e: In March, 1832, the Seventh performed "Sukeroku" at Edo Ichimuraza theater.
In March, 1832, the Seventh performed "Sukeroku" at Edo Ichimuraza theater.

sen.j: そして、長男に市川團十郎 (8代目)を襲名させて自らは市川海老蔵をと襲名した。
sen.e: When he let his eldest son succeed to the professional name of Danjuro ICHIKAWA (the eighth) he succeeded to the professional name of Ebizo ICHIKAWA.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: When he let his eldest son succeed to the professional name of Danjuro ICHIKAWA (the eighth) he succeeded to the professional name of Ebizo ICHIKAWA.
When he let his eldest son succeed to the professional name of Danjuro ICHIKAWA (the eighth) he succeeded to the professional name of Ebizo ICHIKAWA.

sen.j: その際、市川流として公表した歌舞妓狂言組十八番のことをいう。
sen.e: It refers to Kabuki Kyogengumi (a group of comic drama) Juhachiban, which was publicly announced on this occasion as something that belonged to the Ichikawa school.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It refers to Kabuki Kyogengumi (a group of comic drama) Juhachiban, which was publicly announced on this occasion as something that belonged to the Ichikawa school.
It refers to Kabuki Kyogengumi (a group of comic drama) Juhachiban, which was publicly announced on this occasion as something that belonged to the Ichikawa school.

sen.j: いずれも市川團十郎 (初代)・市川團十郎 (2代目)・市川團十郎 (4代目)の團十郎によって初演された立役の当たり芸である。
sen.e: In both cases, they are performance numbers that are sure to be successful with Danjuro as the leading male actor, and the first performance was put on by Danjuro ICHIKAWA (the first), Danjuro ICHIKAWA (the second) and Danjuro ICHIKAWA (the fourth).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: In both cases, they are performance numbers that are sure to be successful with Danjuro as the leading male actor, and the first performance was put on by Danjuro ICHIKAWA (the first), Danjuro ICHIKAWA (the second) and Danjuro ICHIKAWA (the fourth).

In both cases, they are performance numbers that are sure to be successful with Danjuro as the leading male actor, and the first performance was put on by Danjuro ICHIKAWA (the first), Danjuro ICHIKAWA (the second) and Danjuro ICHIKAWA (the fourth).

sen.j: これにより「荒事の成田屋」という看板が確立したといわれる。
sen.e: It is said that by this performance, the feature attraction of 'Aragoto no Naritaya' (aragoto (kabuki play featuring exaggerated posture, makeup, and costume) at Naritaya) was established.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It is said that by this performance, the feature attraction of 'Aragoto no Naritaya' (aragoto (kabuki play featuring exaggerated posture, makeup, and costume) at Naritaya) was established.
It is said that by this performance, the feature attraction of 'Aragoto no Naritaya' (aragoto (kabuki play featuring exaggerated posture, makeup, and costume) at Naritaya) was established.

sen.j: なお、ある者が最も得意とする芸のことを「おはこ」というが、これを「十八番」と書く。
sen.e: Someone's specialty is called 'ohako' (a box). and it is written in Chinese characters as 'juhachiban' (number eighteen).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Someone's specialty is called 'ohako' (a box), and it is written in Chinese characters as 'juhachiban' (number eighteen).
sen.cmt: パンクチュエーションミスです。
sen.e: Someone's specialty is called 'ohako' (a box), and it is written in Chinese characters as 'juhachiban' (number eighteen).

sen.j: これは、市川家ではこの歌舞伎十八番の台本を箱に入れて大切に保管していたことがその由来となっている。
sen.e: This term originates in the Ichikawa family because they placed the scripts of Kabuki Juhachiban in a box and kept the box in a safe place.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: This term originates in the Ichikawa family because they placed the scripts of Kabuki Juhachiban in a box and kept the box in a safe place.
This term originates in the Ichikawa family because they placed the scripts of Kabuki Juhachiban in a box and kept the box in a safe place.

sen.j: 『毛抜毛抜歌舞伎十八番「毛抜」』（けぬき）
